patthana15.75:4.1: Saraṇaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana15.75:5.1: Araṇaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana15.75:6.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana15.75:7.1: Saraṇaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.75:7.2: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana15.75:8.1: Araṇaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
